SitePartDef.label: downed gravship
SitePartDef.description: A gravship crashsite, most of the ship wont be salvagable but we may be able to hack the grav engine and other buildings for valuable resources.
SitePartDef.arrivedLetter: Your caravan has arrived at the downed gravship site.\n\nThe gravship appears heavily damaged. A hackable grav engine core may contain valuable salvage.

SitePartDef.label: salvage gravship
SitePartDef.description: An abandoned gravship awaiting salvage. Initialize the grav engine to activate it, but beware - the process will attract hostile forces.
SitePartDef.arrivedLetter: Your caravan has arrived at the salvage gravship site.\n\nThe gravship appears intact but abandoned. You can initialize the grav engine when ready, but doing so will trigger a lengthy initialization process that will attract enemies.
